name: removeCachedQuery
description: Removes the query with the details you provide from query cache.

params.name: datasource
params.description: The datasource you ran the query on.

params.name: params
params.description: Array of parameter values passed to SQL.

params.name: region
params.description: Specifies the cache region where you can place the cache object.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: the in-memory file system memory set in cfadmin and should return that.
examples.code:
<cfset sql = 'SELECT * from art where artid = ?'> 
 <cfquery name='q' datasource='cfartgallery' cachedwithin='#createTimespan(0, 6, 0, 0)#'> 
 SELECT * from art where artid = <cfqueryPARAM value = '1' CFSQLType = 'CF_SQL_INTEGER'> 
 </cfquery> 
 <cfset a = arrayNew(1)> 
 <cfset a[1] = 1> 
 <cfset removeCachedQuery(sql,'cfartgallery', a)>
